alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Mason; Morgan; Schuyler; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Scott, southwestern Fulton, Cass, Schuyler, southwestern Mason and northwestern Morgan Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Browning to near Beardstown to Meredosia. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Astoria, Bluff Springs and Browning around 335 AM CDT. Arenzville around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Virginia, Chandlerville, Bath and Literberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Mason; Morgan; Schuyler; Scott
